description: An alternative representation of the same physical quantity expressed in a different unit from a different unit code system and possibly with a different value.

element.comment:
It is not necessary for information processing entities to check and enforce that the translations are valid translations of the base unit, but they are allowed to do so, and to reject instances where the translations are not valid. 
NOTE Translations are allowed to contain other representations in UCUM units, but there is generally no point to this as it is possible to convert from one UCUM form to another.

element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
